projects.title: Kodak Hall VR Experience
projects.shortTitle: Realistic Multisensory VR Experience of Kodak Hall
projects.shortDescription: Created a realistic multisensory VR experience of Kodak Hall for studying audio-visual alignment in autism patients
projects.overview: Created a realistic multisensory VR experience of Kodak Hall at Eastman School of Music for studying audio-visual alignment in autism patients. This project combined advanced photogrammetry, laser scanning, and audio engineering to create an immersive virtual environment.

technical.title: 3D Modeling & Optimization
points: Created high-fidelity digital twin using photogrammetry and laser scans
Processed and optimized point cloud data into manageable mesh
Reduced model size from 60GB to 300MB while maintaining visual quality
Implemented LOD (Level of Detail) system for optimal performance

technical.title: Audio System
points: Implemented spatial audio system using Unity's audio spatializer
Created custom audio propagation system for realistic reverb
Integrated real acoustic measurements for accurate sound reproduction

impact: Presented findings at the 2022 & 2024 Frameless XR Symposium
Provided platform for studying audio-visual perception in autism patients
Created reusable framework for future VR research projects

projects.title: InOrbit Robotics System Orchestration
projects.shortDescription: Spearheaded robot orchestration project to improve pick-and-place efficiency and robot deployment times
projects.overview: Led the development of a comprehensive robot orchestration system that significantly improved pick-and-place efficiency and deployment times. Implemented key improvements to the InOrbit control portal and conducted extensive user research to enhance the overall system usability.

technical.title: System Architecture
points: Spearheaded robot orchestration project using Scrum methodology
Developed and maintained product roadmap for Create 2 robot integration
Led implementation of InOrbit control portal
Achieved 30% faster robot deployment times

technical.title: User Experience
points: Conducted comprehensive user research studies
Implemented UX improvements based on user feedback
Increased user task completion rate by 40%
Created intuitive control interfaces for robot management

impact: Enhanced user satisfaction through improved interface design
Established scalable system architecture for future expansions

projects.title: Aigen Robotics Data Platform
projects.shortDescription: Built a scalable data visualization platform for agricultural robots' telemetry and computer vision data
projects.overview: Designed and implemented a comprehensive data visualization platform that processes telemetry and computer vision data from 30+ autonomous agricultural robots. Created an intuitive operator dashboard for real-time monitoring and analysis.

technical.title: Data Pipeline
points: Built scalable data visualization platform processing 1000+ hours of robot telemetry
Architected Python pipeline integrating RTK GPS and CV models
Processed 5Hz sensor data for real-time crop analysis
Implemented async data handling system for distributed operations

technical.title: Frontend Development
points: Designed React operator dashboard with Tailwind CSS
Created interactive weed pressure heat maps
Implemented real-time telemetry visualization
Built responsive interface for mobile and desktop use

impact: Enabled real-time monitoring of 30+ autonomous vehicles
Improved operational efficiency through data-driven insights
Created scalable architecture for future fleet expansion

projects.title: AURUM Medieval Alchemy VR
projects.shortDescription: Led development of an educational VR game teaching medieval alchemy concepts through interactive experiences
projects.overview: Led a cross-functional team in developing AURUM, an educational VR game that teaches medieval alchemy concepts through immersive interactive experiences. Established technical documentation systems and implemented agile workflows.

technical.title: VR Development
points: Led team of 6 developers to deliver ahead of schedule
Architected modular VR framework used across 3 projects
Implemented interactive alchemy simulation system
Created immersive medieval laboratory environment

technical.title: Project Management
points: Established technical documentation system
Implemented agile workflows increasing team velocity by 35%
Conducted technical workshops for 1,300+ students
Achieved 95% positive feedback from user testing

impact: Successfully deployed across multiple educational institutions
Created reusable VR framework for future projects
Received recognition at educational technology conferences
Significantly improved student engagement in chemistry learning

projects.title: MLH DandyHacks Hackathon Director
projects.shortDescription: Led organization of University of Rochester's largest annual hackathon, achieving record participation and sponsorship
projects.overview: Directed the planning and execution of DandyHacks, University of Rochester's premier 36-hour hackathon event. Led a cross-functional team to organize all aspects of the event, from sponsorship and budgeting to event logistics and participant experience.

technical.title: Event Management
points: Led 14 students across 5 teams in event planning and execution
Implemented project management systems for team coordination
Managed complex event logistics for 700+ participants
Coordinated technical infrastructure for virtual and in-person components

technical.title: Sponsorship & Budget
points: Managed $20k event budget with detailed tracking
Secured partnerships with major tech companies
Developed sponsorship tiers and benefits packages
Maintained relationships with Google Cloud, MLH, M&T Bank

impact: Successfully organized first in-person MLH event since Covid
Established sustainable framework for future hackathons
